welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Shelbyville, where southern hospitality meets small-town charm! Known for its picturesque Main Street and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Columbus Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Columbus Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Indianapolis International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: A concourse within the main terminal, primarily serving domestic flights for airlines such as Delta and Southwest.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: A concourse within the main terminal, primarily serving domestic flights for airlines such as American and United.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: A concourse within the main terminal, primarily serving international flights for airlines such as Air Canada and Lufthansa.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
